mapper.select: SELECT newInvestorCount.newInvestor AS newInvestor, totalInvestorCount.totalInvestor AS totalInvestor, newCfpCount.newCfp AS newCfp, totalCfpCount.totalCfp AS totalCfp, newInvestmentCount.newInvestment AS newInvestment, totalInvestmentCount.totalInvestment AS totalInvestment FROM ( SELECT count(DISTINCT user_id) AS newInvestor FROM tcrm_investor WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) newInvestorCount, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT user_id) AS totalInvestor FROM tcrm_investor ) totalInvestorCount, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT user_id) AS newCfp FROM tcrm_cfplanner WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) newCfpCount, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT user_id) AS totalCfp FROM tcrm_cfplanner ) totalCfpCount, ( SELECT sum(IFNULL(invest_amt, 0)) AS newInvestment FROM tcim_product_invest_record WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) newInvestmentCount, ( SELECT sum(IFNULL(invest_amt, 0)) AS totalInvestment FROM tcim_product_invest_record ) totalInvestmentCount

SELECT count(DISTINCT user_id) AS registerInvestorNum, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, #{dateFormat}) AS registerInvestorTime FROM tcrm_investor WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, #{dateFormat}) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, #{dateFormat}) AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, #{dateFormat}) GROUP BY registerInvestorTime

SELECT count(DISTINCT user_id) AS registerCfpNum, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, #{dateFormat}) AS registerCfpTime FROM tcrm_cfplanner WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, #{dateFormat}) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, #{dateFormat}) AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, #{dateFormat}) GROUP BY registerCfpTime

SELECT sum(IFNULL(invest_amt, 0)) AS currentInvestment, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, #{dateFormat}) AS investTime FROM tcim_product_invest_record WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, #{dateFormat}) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, #{dateFormat}) AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, #{dateFormat}) GROUP BY investTime
